entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
